cause.description:
put a stop to abuseive photos that may look funny to some people but really are hurting a poor innocent animal that can't do anything about it. So thats why we have to do something about it because if we dont who will?
1. stop people from exploiting animals for personal recognition
2. ending animal abuse
cause.mission: Stop people from abuseing animals for photo purposes
cause.name: Put a stop to abuseive animal photos
